newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Text of WTO Director-General Ruggiero's speech.
newsitem.headline: Text of WTO Director-General Ruggiero's speech.

text.p: The following is the full text of an address by World Trade Organisation Director-General Renato Ruggiero on Monday to the WTO ministerial conference in Singapore.

"This is a very important meeting. If the completion of the Uruguay Round in Marrakesh closed an important chapter of economic history, this first ministerial conference in Singapore opens a new one. This is not a new chapter just because our organisation has a new name or new sectors of responsibility or a new dispute settlement procedure.
